it.polimi.se2018.model.testCards

Class TestCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.testCards.TestCard

  • public class TestCard
extends java.lang.Object
    TestCard Class This class tests the creation of any type of card
    Author:
    Davide Lorenzi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestCard() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFavMarkers()
      Favour Marker Adder Tester This test verifies that the method returns the correct number of Favour Markers on a ToolCard This test verifies that the method returns 404 error because PublicObjectiveCards and PrivateObjectiveCards haven't Favour Markers
      void cloneCard()
      Clone Tester This method tests that the cloning process run and produce all the cards attribute and checks that all attributes are the same of the original Card
      void getCardDescription()
      CardDescription Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct description of the ToolCard Asked by the user.
      void getCardName()
      GetCardName Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct CardName
      void getCardNumber()
      GetCard Number Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct CardNumber.
      void getCardType()
      GetCardType Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct CardType
      void getDieColor()
      GetDieColor Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct color of the die to sacrifice to active the ToolCard in Single Player mode This test also verifies that the method return noColor error because PublicObjectiveCards haven't this attribute.
      void getNumMarkers()
      GetNumMarker Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct (or a possible one) Favour Markers number and verifies that PublicObjectiveCards and PrivateObjectiveCards return 404 because they haven't Favour Markers
      void getPrice()
      Get Price Tester This test verifies that the method returns the correct Price of a ToolCard This test verifies that the method returns 404 error because PublicObjectiveCards and PrivateObjectiveCards haven't Price
      void getPublicVictoryPoint()
      Public Victory Points Getter Tester This test verifies that the method returns the correct number of Public Victory Points This test verifies that the method returns 404 error because ToolCards and PrivateObjectiveCards haven't Favour Markers
      void setUp()
      Card Initialization This method initializes the test class

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void getDieColor()
        GetDieColor Tester This test verifies that the method return the correct color of the die to sacrifice to active the ToolCard in Single Player mode This test also verifies that the method return noColor error because PublicObjectiveCards haven't this attribute. This test also verifies that the method return the correct color of the Die that will be used for the count of the PrivateScore

      • cloneCard

        public void cloneCard()
               throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Clone Tester This method tests that the cloning process run and produce all the cards attribute and checks that all attributes are the same of the original Card
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if is not possible to clone a card
